channel.title: CVE Feed for FunnelKit -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FunnelKit -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51672|2024-03-21T17:25:36.387Z -- funnelkit -- funnelkit%20checkout
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in FunnelKit FunnelKit Checkout.This issue affects FunnelKit Checkout: from n/a through 3.10.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-50857|2023-12-28T10:57:46.626Z -- funnelkit -- recover%20woocommerce%20cart%20abandonment%2C%20newsletter%2C%20email%20marketing%2C%20marketing%20automation%20by%20funnelkit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in FunnelKit Recover WooCommerce Cart Abandonment, Newsletter, Email Marketing, Marketing Automation By FunnelKit.This issue affects Recover WooCommerce Cart Abandonment, Newsletter, Email Marketing, Marketing Automation By FunnelKit: from n/a through 2.6.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-50856|2023-12-28T11:01:03.703Z -- funnelkit -- funnel%20builder%20for%20wordpress%20by%20funnelkit%20%E2%80%93%20customize%20woocommerce%20checkout%20pages%2C%20create%20sales%20funnels%20%26%20maximize%20profits
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in FunnelKit Funnel Builder for WordPress by FunnelKit – Customize WooCommerce Checkout Pages, Create Sales Funnels & Maximize Profits.This issue affects Funnel Builder for WordPress by FunnelKit – Customize WooCommerce Checkout Pages, Create Sales Funnels & Maximize Profits: from n/a through 2.14.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-2580|2024-06-07T18:37:38.270Z -- funnelkit -- automation%20by%20autonami
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FunnelKit Automation By Autonami allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Automation By Autonami: from n/a through 2.8.2.
